message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $165.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $165 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $145?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $152
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to do $150?
